QuestData.Title: Swimming Lessons
QuestData.Description:
For millennia we have roamed Azeroth's depths, yet never has a land walker journeyed with us. In order to help us, you must learn to travel the waters as we do.
The three scrolls of the sea shall grant you the energies to travel and survive underwater as we do.
Bring me the Scrolls of Harmonious Fins, Endless Tides and Graceful Breaths.
QuestData.CompletionText: You must collect the Scroll of Harmonious Fins, Endless Tides and Graceful Breaths.
QuestData.RewardText: These will do nicely. Just as we are, you shall now be one with the sea.
